tool_description: Analyzes current market conditions including supply, demand, pricing trends, and economic factors that may impact property values in a specific area and timeframe.

location.description: Geographic area for market analysis (city, zip code, or neighborhood)

property_type.description: Property type for market analysis focus

analysis_period_months.description: Number of months to analyze for trends

include_foreclosures.description: Include foreclosure sales in market analysis

market_segments.description: Specific market segments to analyze (luxury, starter, mid-range, etc.)

error_messages: Invalid location: The specified location cannot be found or is not supported for market analysis.
Invalid property type: Property type must be one of the supported categories.
Analysis period out of range: Analysis period must be between 3 and 60 months.
Insufficient market data: Not enough recent sales data available for reliable market analysis.
Invalid market segment: One or more specified market segments are not recognized.
usage: Specify the location and property type for market analysis. Optionally set the analysis timeframe and market segments to focus the assessment on relevant market conditions.

market_trend.description: Overall market trend direction (appreciating, stable, declining)

average_days_on_market.description: Average number of days properties stay on the market

price_trend_percentage.description: Percentage change in average prices over analysis period

absorption_rate.description: Rate at which available properties are sold (months of supply)

market_factors.description: Key economic and market factors influencing property values
